topic: Common assumptions about renewable energy costs and benefits
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that some of my assumptions may be based on outdated or incomplete information. My next step is to actively seek feedback from diverse perspectives and gather new data to reassess these assumptions. I will also engage in discussions with others to identify any collective assumptions that might be influencing our decisions and consider how these could be updated or challenged.

metadata.trigger: What assumption am I making that might be wrong?
